document.full_text: the u.n. human rights council agreed on thursday to a u.s.-backed proposal to establish a u.n. human rights investigator for iran, the first in a decade.
document.title: u.n. human rights body approves investigator on iran
lines_and_colors: the u.n. human rights council agreed on thursday to a u.s.-backed proposal to establish a u.n. human rights investigator for iran, the first in a decade.
